mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY_COMM_TASK_EXEC (SETTLEDATE, TASKCODE, TASKNAME, TASKGROUPCODE, TASKGROUPNAME, BUSICODE, BUSICODENAME, BATCHID, TASKTYPE, TASKINDEX, TASKCLASSNAME, EXECPARAM, EXECSTATE, STARTTIME, ENDTIME) values (#{settleDate}, #{taskCode}, #{taskName}, #{taskGroupCode}, #{taskGroupName}, #{busiCode} , #{busiCodeName}, #{batchId}, #{taskType}, #{taskIndex}, #{taskClassName}, #{execParam}, #{execState} , #{startTime}, #{endTime})
mapper.select: SELECT SETTLEDATE, TASKCODE, TASKNAME, TASKGROUPCODE, TASKGROUPNAME, BUSICODE, BUSICODENAME, BATCHID, TASKTYPE, TASKINDEX, TASKCLASSNAME, EXECPARAM, EXECSTATE, STARTTIME, ENDTIME FROM PAY_COMM_TASK_EXEC WHERE SETTLEDATE = #{settleDate} AND (EXECSTATE = 'FAIL' OR EXECSTATE = 'EXPT')
mapper.delete: delete from PAY_COMM_TASK_EXEC where SETTLEDATE = #{settleDate} AND BATCHID = #{batchId} AND TASKGROUPCODE = #{taskGroupCode}
